description: Voxxed caught up with serial author Bruce Tate during Devoxx Poland and talked about his involvement in the Elixir community, how he thinks developers in the Java space can learn from it, and the benefits of extending polyglotism annually.

title: Can the Java Community Learn from the Elixir Community?
